Overview.Summary: In 2024, the presidential debates will be held on September and October (4), with the election taking place on November 5 (4). The election pits Republican Donald Trump against Democrat Joe Biden (6). The election is making history as it is between a former and current president (6). In addition to the US election, there will also be presidential elections in Azerbaijan (2), Venezuela (7), and possibly Ukraine (10). India's general election also falls in 2024 (9). However, there have been discussions about potentially postponing the US election due to the ongoing war, but this would break a 175-year precedent (5).

Timeline.Text: The dates and locations for the 2024 presidential debates are announced.
The possibility of postponing the 2024 presidential election is discussed due to ongoing war.
A preview of the upcoming Lok Sabha elections in India, which are set to take place in 2024.
The first presidential debate is announced to take place on June 27, 2024.
The 2024 U.S. presidential election is making history with a former president, Donald Trump, running against the current president, Joe Biden.
Ilham Aliyev wins a fifth consecutive term as president of Azerbaijan in the 2024 presidential election.
Nicolás Maduro is announced as the candidate for the 2024 Venezuelan presidential election.
A brief overview of the United States presidential election, which is set to take place on November 5, 2024.
The 2024 U.S. presidential election is no ordinary election year due to the age of the two leading candidates, 81 and 77.
A look at the 2024 presidential elections taking place around the world, including in Pakistan, Iran, Venezuela, and Ukraine.

Timeline.Text: The polling for Iran's parliamentary elections closes, with a record low turnout of 40.6%.
The 2024 United States elections are held, including the presidential election and the election for all 435 seats in the House of Representatives and 34 of the 100 seats in the Senate.
The verdict for Donald Trump's hush money trial is expected to be announced, with potential implications for the 2024 presidential election.
The Electoral Commission of Malta announces the collection of voting documents for the European Parliament and Local Councils Elections in June 2024.
National polls for the 2024 presidential election show the Democratic Progressive Party winning a third consecutive victory in Taiwan.
The U.S. midterm elections show a pattern of worse-than-expected results for the Republican Party, potentially impacting the 2024 presidential election.
The presidential election in Egypt ends, with President el-Sisi expected to win.

Political speculation begins about the possible candidates for the 2024 Maltese presidential election.

Juliana Scerri Ferrante becomes the first Maltese national to serve on the United Nations' Committee on the Rights of the Child.

Overview.Summary: The 2024 Maltese presidential election took place on March 27, 2024 (20). In the lead-up to the election, there were concerns about low voter turnout (1). The election results were a historic third consecutive victory for the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (11). The incumbent president, Tsai Ing-wen, was unable to run for reelection due to term limits (3). The election was closely watched by China (11). In other news, President Xi Jinping of China congratulated Myriam Spiteri Debono on taking office as the new Maltese president (4). There were also concerns about the age of the candidates for the major party nominations in the United States presidential election (2,5,6,7,8,10,12,15). In Egypt, President el-Sisi was expected to win the presidential election (13,16). Senator Ted Cruz was asked about accepting the results of the 2024 presidential election (17).

Timeline.Text: The 2024 Maltese presidential election takes place, with candidates Hazem Omar and Myriam Spiteri Debono being the front-runners.
The Democratic Progressive Party wins a historic third consecutive presidential victory in Taiwan.
The United States holds its presidential primary elections on Super Tuesday, with voters in 16 states and one territory heading to the polls.
Jurors in the first-ever criminal trial of a former U.S. president, Donald Trump's hush money case, may render their verdict.
Key dates and events for the 2024 presidential election are announced, including voter deadlines, debates, and state primary and caucus events.
The results of the Oregon presidential election are announced, with Donald Trump securing the Republican nomination and Joe Biden securing the Democratic nomination.
Presidential elections are held in Taiwan, with the Democratic Progressive Party's Vice President Lai Ching-te winning the presidency.
The United States holds its presidential election, with the Republican and Democratic nominees being the oldest pairing of candidates in American history.
National polls for the 2024 presidential election indicate a close race between the two major party nominees, with a large portion of voters expressing dissatisfaction with both candidates.
Chinese President Xi Jinping congratulates Myriam Spiteri Debono on taking office as the new Maltese president.
